about_the_game:
Step into the chaotic yet captivating life of a Railway Chai Wala at the Fakripur railway station, where the rhythm of trains is matched only by the hustle of hungry passengers. Ramu, a hardworking chaiwala running his shop at the Fakripur railway station. From brewing chai to frying samosas, serving guests, and selling cola, your daily tasks are as lively as the trains rushing past. But beneath the vibrant surface of sizzling samosas and steaming chai lies a web of secrets waiting to be unraveled.

Key Features:

  • Chai Brewing: Show your skills in brewing the perfect cup of chai and coffee, delighting passengers with authentic Indian flavors.

  • Indian Snacks Galore: Serve crispy samosas, prepare mouthwatering vada pav, and offer chilled Kokila Kola to satisfy a variety of cravings for hungry travelers.

  • Engage with Passengers: Meet a colorful cast of characters, each with their own quirks, stories, and sometimes with eerie behavior.

  • Railway Platform Realism: Experience the sights, sounds, and chaos of a bustling Indian railway station, complete with dynamic crowds and lifelike audio.

  • Eerie Mysteries Unfold: Encounter strange events and uncover the hidden, spine-chilling secrets lurking in the station’s shadows.

  • Authentic Indian Vibes: Immerse yourself in the cultural essence of India with vibrant visuals, detailed environments, and an atmospheric soundtrack that brings Fakripur to life.

Whether it’s brewing chai or unraveling mysteries, Railway Chai Wala is a game that blends the warmth of Indian hospitality with the thrill of suspense. Can you thrive as Fakripur’s favorite chaiwala while braving the station’s enigmatic secrets? The answers await in this one-of-a-kind adventure!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Step into the world of Ramu, a spirited railway chaiwala at the bustling Fakripur station. Life isn’t just about brewing chai—it’s steeped in mystery! Uncover dark, masala-filled secrets in this Psychological Thriller Game with a blend of suspense and Indian flavor!
